医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从童年到青春期的良好身体素质与更好的心理健康相关芬兰最近的一项研究发现，从童年到青春期的良好身体素质与青春期更好的心理健康有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Good-physical-fitness-from-childhood-to-adolescent-linked-with-better-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Good-physical-fitness-from-childhood-to-adolescent-linked-with-better-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=518b6eea-f3c7-45ce-85e5-f4b6c27cd961 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 08:28:37 -0400 Good physical fitness from childhood to adolescence associated with better mental health
开发新测试以简化过敏诊断伯尔尼大学和伯尔尼大学医院的研究人员开发了一种测试来简化过敏的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-test-development-to-simplify-the-diagnosis-of-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-test-development-to-simplify-the-diagnosis-of-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b98ddbbc-a1ae-4cb1-b444-23e32856662c Tue, 15 Oct 2024 07:15:00 -0400 New test developed to simplify the diagnosis of allergies
基于细菌的创新疗法显示出抗癌前景尽管癌症仍然是全球死亡的主要原因，但基于细菌的癌症疗法提供了一种令人兴奋的创新治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Innovative-bacteria-based-therapy-shows-promise-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Innovative-bacteria-based-therapy-shows-promise-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9def4bb1-3ee4-4540-b841-87c4efac0dce Tue, 15 Oct 2024 07:02:00 -0400 Innovative bacteria-based therapy shows promise against cancer

数百万美国老年人独自面临痴呆症社会学家埃琳娜·波塔科隆大吃一惊。当她来到旧金山的家门口进行研究项目时，她拜访了许多旧金山的老年人，他们都感到困惑。他们忘记了约会，或者不记得和她说过话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Millions-of-aging-Americans-are-faceing-dementia-by-themselves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Millions-of-aging-Americans-are-faceing-dementia-by-themselves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a0803db-57a5-4ba0-aa5c-1acce00cd115 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 06:34:44 -0400 Millions of aging Americans are facing dementia by themselves
由于州限制延期，加州医院争先恐后地进行抗震改造加州 410 家医院中，超过一半的医院至少有一栋大楼在发生大地震后可能无法运营，而且许多机构声称他们没有足够的资金来满足 2030 年的法定期限地震改造后，国家现在正在向一些人提供救济，同时加大对其他人完成工作的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/California-hospitals-scramble-on-earthquake-retrofits-as-state-limits-extensions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/California-hospitals-scramble-on-earthquake-retrofits-as-state-limits-extensions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea9847a9-fb1f-4ddb-b24b-0927e412fd82 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 06:31:37 -0400 California hospitals scramble on earthquake retrofits as state limits extensions

研究表明 COVID-19 疫苗与 5,000 多名患者出现暂时性面瘫有关这项研究确定了 COVID-19 疫苗与面瘫之间的潜在联系，呼吁加强对疫苗安全性的监测和了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-links-COVID-19-vaccines-to-temporary-facial-palsy-in-over-5000-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-links-COVID-19-vaccines-to-temporary-facial-palsy-in-over-5000-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860d38c0-f682-48ec-85c1-36e49d00822f Tue, 15 Oct 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Research links COVID-19 vaccines to temporary facial palsy in over 5,000 patients

气候变化焦虑正在推动美国人采取集体气候行动新的研究表明，虽然气候焦虑促使许多美国人对气候变化采取行动，但那些患有严重困扰的人可能难以参与，这凸显了在应对环境威胁时需要心理健康支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Climate-change-anxiety-is-pushing-Americans-toward-collective-climate-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Climate-change-anxiety-is-pushing-Americans-toward-collective-climate-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b00b7401-668d-4286-94db-c8c52367b741 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 00:20:00 -0400 Climate change anxiety is pushing Americans toward collective climate action
